<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Weapon Surge](/Spells.aspx?ID=469)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 399 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 weapon you're wielding
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Holding your weapon aloft, you fill it with divine energy. On your next Strike with that weapon before the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 status bonus to the attack roll and the weapon deals an additional die of damage. If the weapon has a _striking_ rune, this instead increases the number of dice from the _striking_ rune by 1 (to a maximum of 3 extra weapon dice).

If the target weapon leaves your possession, _weapon surge_ immediately ends.
name: Weapon Surge
